version_description:
UX improvements.
Performance Optimization.
Bug Fixes.

You asked, we listened!

GIANT ROBOT OPENED!
A brand new minigame to play with your friends!

GEMS
A new currency to buy special items and play more!

NIGHT AND DAY
A new and amazing day-to-night transition in the world of PK XD.

CHAT IMPROVEMENT
New phrases and a search system for a smoother conversation experience.


Also in this update:
New SFX and music for indoor environments;
Bug fixes and small enhancements.

Let us know what you think! Write your review to help us keep improving!

- Come to our new amazing school!
- Earn more coins by using our new rewarding system!
Bug Fixes.

What's up, PK XD players!

You asked, we listened: this update brings to life what you wanted the most!

FRIENDS' LIST: Add your friends and play with them in the same city!

PK XD ACCOUNT: Sign up to continue playing in different devices without losing your progress.

This update also includes:
- New chat messages
- New clothes and furniture
- FREE uniform when you're at school
- Bug fixes and enhancements

How do you like that? Write your review to help us keep improving!

What's up, PK XD players!
You asked, we listened: this update brings to life what you wanted the most!

FRIENDS' LIST: Add your friends and play with them in the same city!

PK XD ACCOUNT: Sign up to continue playing in different devices without losing your progress.

This update also includes:
- New chat messages
- New clothes and furniture
- FREE uniform when you're at school
- Bug fixes and enhancements

How do you like that? Write your review to help us keep improving!

Here is a cool new PKXD update people!

DAILY REWARD
For each day played in sequence, get a bigger reward!

HOUSE LIKE BOARD
Like other player's and friend's houses and also see how they like yours!

This update also includes:
- New furnitures and cool types of hairs to customize your avatar;
- Bug fixes and enhancements.

How do you like that? Write your review to help us keep improving!

Here is a cool new PKXD update people!

DAILY REWARD
For each day played in sequence, get a bigger reward!

HOUSE LIKE BOARD
Like other player's and friend's houses and also see how they like yours!

This update also includes:
- New furnitures and cool types of hairs to customize your avatar;
- Bug fixes and enhancements.

How do you like that? Write your review to help us keep improving!

Hi PKXD friends!

NEW CHAT LAYOUT
We've categorized the sentences and now it's easier to talk to your friends. Plus we added new sentences!

This update also includes bug fixes and enhancements.

How do you like that? Write your review to help us keep improving!

It's Halloween night in the world of PK XD and we bring you lots of cool stuff:

Explore the world of PK XD in a sinister night of Halloween!
Get tons of exclusive items to turn your avatar in a vampire, witch, zombie and other creatures.
Get coffins, bats, spider-webs and much more to set the Halloween mood in your house.
New Halloween emojis!

Enjoy while it lasts! The Halloween night and the exclusive items will only be available as long as the event lasts!

It's Halloween night in the world of PK XD and we bring you lots of cool stuff:

Explore the world of PK XD in a sinister night of Halloween!
Get tons of exclusive items to turn your avatar in a vampire, witch, zombie and other creatures.
Get coffins, bats, spider-webs and much more to set the Halloween mood in your house.
New Halloween emojis!

Enjoy while it lasts! The Halloween night and the exclusive items will only be available as long as the event lasts!

CHRISTMAS HAS ARRIVED!
Ho ho ho! Explore and enjoy the snow and the awesome decorations in the world of PK XD!

XMAS CLOTHING
Wear the coolest 2019 xmas clothes!

XMAS DECORATIONS
Get the new themed furniture to set the xmas mood in your house.

EXTERNAL DECORATION
Now you can decorate the external part of your house! Don't waste time and set the xmas mood even more!

Let us know what you think! Write your review to help us keep improving!

NEW XMAS MINIGAME
Find the lost gifts and get an exclusive Xmas item!

MERRY CHRISTMAS
Play PK XD on December 25th and get a gift!

HIDDEN GIFT
Can you find it?
Gather your friends and go find it!

NEW FRIEND LIST LIMIT!
Now you can have up to 50 friends on your PK XD!

PLUS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.
Let us know what you think! Write your review to help us keep improving!

UNDER CONSTRUCTION
Xmas is over, but we're working on awesome new stuff. Stay tuned!

SURPRISE BOX
Now you can get it on Crazy Run and Daily Reward!

NEW FRIEND LIST LIMIT!
Now you can have up to 50 friends on PK XD!

NEW IN-GAME NOTIFICATION
Be notified when your friends get online.

PLUS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.

NEW PREMIUM STORE
A new spaceship just arrived at PK XD. Go and check out all the awesome stuff you can only find there!

GESTURES
You can now interact even more with other players!

NEW BUILDING ON THE WAY
Ours robots are still working hard on it! But in the meanwhile, did you find the Surprise Box there?

NEW CHAT OPTIONS
New phrases to enrich the conversation with your friends!

AS ALWAYS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.

Let us know what you think!
Write your review to help us keep improving!

INVITE YOUR FRIENDS TO PLAY PK XD
Bring your buddies, and get coins, gems and exclusive items!

HALLOWEEN SALE
Halloween is gone, but we still got some spooky items in storage. Don't miss this EERIE-sistible chance!

PLUS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.

Let us know what you think!
Write your review to help us keep improving!

Bring your buddies, and get coins, gems and exclusive items!

PLUS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.

Let us know what you think!

THE ARMORS ARRIVED
Wear super cool armors and use its special powers! Go check it out in the Premium Store!

PLUS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.

Let us know what you think!
Write your review to help us keep improving!

NEW TREE HOUSE
Buy the Tree House Bundle and get this super exclusive house!

PK XD VIDEOS ON YOUTUBE
Stay tuned with the best videos about PK XD on YouTube!

ADOPT A PET
The Adoption Fair is in town! Go check it out next to the area that's (still!) under construction!

PET PODS
There's a Pet inside of each Pet Pod, you just need to wait until it's ready to open. Who knows what will come out?!

GIVE YOUR PET THE STYLE YOU LIKE
Your Pet can be as stylish as you! What are you wating for? Show it to your friends!

PK XD ON INSTAGRAM
Citizen of PK XD! You are invited to follow our OFFICIAL Instagram account! Keep up with all the news from our universe... Check it out now!

AS ALWAYS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.

NEW WOODEN FURNITURE
Get and combine the entire collection for your tr… beautiful house!

AWESOME NEW GARDEN ITEMS!
It's your chance to get a dino robot or a unicorn for your garden!

So, are you having a good time with your pets? Stay tuned, we'll have some news soon!

AS ALWAYS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.

SHOW YOUR PETS SOME AFFECTION
Now you can interact with your pets by holding or petting them.

BE CAREFUL WITH YOUR ACCOUNT
Watch out for people promising you coins and gems, and never share your personal information.

So, are you having a good time with your pets? Stay tuned, we'll have some news soon!

AS ALWAYS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.

Let us know what you think!
Write your review to help us keep improving!

NEW ARMORS!
We've got new armors arriving on the Premium Store. Go check out the Bear and Dragon Armors!

*Hot Fix*
NEW ARMORS!
We've got new armors arriving on the Premium Store. Go check out the Bear and Dragon Armors!

THE PET SHOP IS ALMOST READY!
Our robots are finishing the PetShop, go there and check how things are going. Are you excited about it? Stay tuned!

AS ALWAYS:
Bug fixes and small enhancements.

Let us know what you think!
Write your review to help us keep improving!

PET SHOP INAUGURATION
Finally the day has come! RUN THERE to see what's new!

NEW PETS
More pets have arrived in the world of PK XD! They can be COMMON, UNCOMMON or RARE. You can learn more about them at the Pet Shop.

A NEW PET POD HAS ARRIVED
Now we have Pet Pods and Super Pet Pods! With a Super Pet Pod, you have more chances to adopt uncommon or rare pets!

EVOLVE YOUR PETS
The pets now gain experience (XP) by playing minigames with you! Go and play with them so they can evolve

IMPROVED CHAT
The chat has been reformulated and now talking to your friends has become easier than ever!
Choose different text balloons to express yourself better!

ANIMATED EMOJIS
Emojis now come to life and they are much more fun to use. Give it a try.

NEW MASKS
We know that things haven't been easy in the outside world, but hold on, this will pass! Meanwhile, stay home and enjoy these super cool masks for you to wear in PK XD!

IMPROVED CHAT
The chat has been reformulated and now talking to your friends has become easier than ever!
Choose different text balloons to express yourself better!

ANIMATED EMOJIS
Emojis now come to life and they are much more fun to use. Give it a try.

NEW MASKS
We know that things haven't been easy in the outside world, but hold on, this will pass! Meanwhile, stay home and enjoy these super cool masks for you to wear in PK XD!

Bug fixes

EPIC PETS
One more pet category is available in the Pet Pods. Open it and discover who these pets are!

MORE PETS HAVE ARRIVED ON PK XD
There are now more 6 pets in the Common, Uncommon and Rare categories. What are you waiting for? Go take a look at the Pet Shop and complete your collection!

EPIC PETS
One more pet category is available in the Pet Pods. Open it and discover who these pets are!

MORE PETS HAVE ARRIVED ON PK XD
There are now more 6 pets in the Common, Uncommon and Rare categories. What are you waiting for? Go take a look at the Pet Shop and complete your collection!

Hi folks, check out what's in this new update:
- Now you can change your nickname! To do it, go to the Settings screen.
- The Nickname system was enhanced and you can get a nickname even if other players got it too.
- Your friends nickname are now displayed in a different color, and it's easier to find them.
- New masks for your collection!

In this update:

- They can now get hungry, thirsty, like scratches behind their ears, and need to take a nap and a bath every once in a while;
- Whenever your pet expresses a need and you take care of it, they will gain XP. Nice, don't ya think?
- A brand-new room was inaugurated in the Pet Shop, where you can buy bowls, beds, and fancy bathtubs for your pets!

In this update:

- They can now get hungry, thirsty, like scratches behind their ears, and need to take a nap and a bath every once in a while;
- Whenever your pet expresses a need and you take care of it, they will gain XP. Nice, don't ya think?
- A brand-new room was inaugurated in the Pet Shop, where you can buy bowls, beds, and fancy bathtubs for your pets!

In this update:

Fixed some bugs in the pet's interactions and in the fruit quest.

In this update:
- New super premium Rocket House;
- New space suit with low gravity;
- Friend list limit increased up to 100 friends;
- Bug fixes and small enhancements.

In this update:
- Giant robot under construction again. Stay tuned!
- Bug fixes and small enhancements.

THE GIANT ROBOT IS EVEN MORE POWERFUL!

- New Giant Robot exterior with a video-game theme
- New minigame: PET PARADE! Count pets while watching a chaotic parade!
- New location inside the Giant Robot: THE ARCADE HUB!
- New currency: TICKETS! Collect them every day and buy exclusive items very soon!

THE GIANT ROBOT IS EVEN MORE POWERFUL!

- New Giant Robot exterior with a video-game theme
- New minigame: PET PARADE! Count pets while watching a chaotic parade!
- New location inside the Giant Robot: THE ARCADE HUB!
- New currency: TICKETS! Collect them every day and buy exclusive items very soon!

TICKET STORE

- The Ticket Store is now open for business! Trade your Tickets for exclusive items!
- New content will be added periodically, so make sure to always visit the store!

TICKET STORE

- The Ticket Store is now open for business! Trade your Tickets for exclusive items!
- New content will be added periodically, so make sure to always visit the store!

PLUS: Bug fixes and small enhancements.

NEW CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS
- New hair styles and clothing options have been added to the game!
- Spice up your avatar and prove you're the most stylish!

PERFORMANCE IMPROVEMENTS
- We've worked hard to improve our server's stability and overall app performance!
- Let us know if you have any technical problem while playing PK XD!

NEW CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS
- New hair styles and clothing options have been added to the game!
- Spice up your avatar and prove you're the most stylish!

PERFORMANCE IMPROVEMENTS
- We've worked hard to improve our server's stability and overall app performance!
- Let us know if you have any technical problem while playing PK XD!

YOUR SMARTPHONE
- Manage your friends and pets, customize your avatar, check all the new videos on Youtube in your own smartphone!

PET PARADE REBALANCE
- We've heard your feedback and rebalanced Pet Parade!
- Pet Parade's difficulty and the amount of Tickets given each round have been adjusted accordingly.

NEW CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS
- Spice up your avatar and prove you're the most stylish!

UNDER CONSTRUCTION
- There's something new under construction on PK XD!

YOUR SMARTPHONE
- Manage your friends and pets, customize your avatar, check all the new videos on Youtube in your own smartphone!

PET PARADE REBALANCE
- We've heard your feedback and rebalanced Pet Parade!
- Pet Parade's difficulty and the amount of Tickets given each round have been adjusted accordingly.

NEW CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS
- Spice up your avatar and prove you're the most stylish!

UNDER CONSTRUCTION
- There's something new under construction on PK XD!

BUGS
- Bug Fixes

NEW CRAZY RUN LEVEL
We've changed the level to a much more fun and challenging one. What're you waiting for? Call all your friends to play together!
Stay tuned for more updates soon!

NEW CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS IN THE PREMIUM STORE
Spice up your avatar and prove you're the most stylish!

AS ALWAYS:
Bug fixes and small enhancements.

Let us know what you think!
Write your review to help us keep improving!

NEW BUILDING: HAIR SALON
- A new building have arrived in town: the Hair Salon! Call all your friends and come change your look in whole new ways!
- There is also a brand new "style" chat category!

HAIR COLORING
- Now you can dye your hair in many different colors in the Hair Salon!
- Gradient colors? Metallic colors? We've got you covered!

NEW BUILDING: HAIR SALON
- A new building have arrived in town: the Hair Salon! Call all your friends and come change your look in whole new ways!
- There is also a brand new "style" chat category!

HAIR COLORING
- Now you can dye your hair in many different colors in the Hair Salon!
- Gradient colors? Metallic colors? We've got you covered!

HELLO KITTY AND FRIENDS!
- Hello Kitty and friends have arrived on PK XD with exclusive packs!
- Everyone can also get some exclusive wallpapers!

FURNITURE PLACEMENT
- Furniture can now be placed mid-air!
- A new type of furniture "basic shapes" has been added.

LEGENDARY PETS
- Legendary Pets are now available alongside a new type of Pet Pod!
- We've also reduced the price of Pet Pods.

PET INVENTORY MANAGEMENT
- If you need to free inventory space you can now send off your pet.

* Ready for iOS14

Our 1st year anniversary event is live for a limited time!
- Take on challenges to earn prizes
- Explore a birthday themed PK XD island
- Engage in our first global event where all players cooperate to win a special prize!
- New customization items will be available for the duration of the event
- A Birthday Pack is also available and includes a miniature of our giant anniversary cake, coins and gems!
- A new "event" chat category

EVERY PARTY COMES TO AN END
- We would like to thank all of the people that took part in our 1st PK XD anniversary event! It was awesome, and we wouldn't be here without you, our citizens. Stay tuned, there's more coming soon!
- Oh... and don't forget to check out our Instagram page when you can. We've come up with a few fun facts about our first anniversary that you might like to know.

NEW LOFT HOUSE
- There is only a single room, but it's HUUUGE!
- Want to create your own parkour track inside the house? Or maybe a labyrinth? Or place walls and create rooms any way you want? You decide!

In this update:
- Celebrate the spooky and fun Halloween Event with your friends!
- Play the new Candy Hunt minigame!
- Adopt the new Halloween Pets and complete your collection!
- Lots of Halloween Items: makeup, hairstyles, costumes and furnitures with the Halloween theme!
- Bug fixes and small enhancements.

In this update:
- You can now take photos around the PK XD island with your phone!
- Customize your photos with cool stickers before sharing it!
- Broom of Flying: Fly around the world of PK XD like a witch and have fun;
- New gestures and Halloween dance;
- A lot more Halloween Items: makeup, hairstyles, costumes and furnitures with the Halloween theme!
- Bug fixes and small enhancements.

HALLOWEEN HAS ENDED
- We would like to thank all the people that took part in our 2nd PK XD Halloween event! It was another amazing event, and we hope you have enjoyed it!

NEW CLUB HOUSE
- Have you ever dreamed of having the perfect house to invite your friends over and have a party?
- Not only it's beautiful on the outside but it also has a spacious room that features your very own music stage and an exclusive DJ table!

THE PLAZA
- There is a new location in town! The plaza is THE place to hang out, make new friends and relax! Check it out, you can find it close to the beach!

- We're proud to announce that the looks from the "Fashion Looks Challenge" are available at our stores!
- Artists Pigionbaby#723, Glamorgirly#335, RatoBaleado#475, ToxicSoul#102 and Clarice#3187 rocked with their creations!
- Get your favorite looks now at the avatar store!
- Bug fixes and small enhancements.

HALLOWEEN HAS ENDED
- We would like to thank all the people that took part in our 2nd PK XD Halloween event! It was another amazing event, and we hope you have enjoyed it!

NEW CLUB HOUSE
- Have you ever dreamed of having the perfect house to invite your friends over and have a party?
- Not only it's beautiful on the outside but it also has a spacious room that features your very own music stage and an exclusive DJ table!

THE PLAZA
- There is a new location in town! The plaza is THE place to hang out, make new friends and relax! Check it out, you can find it close to the beach!

- We're proud to announce that the looks from the "Fashion Looks Challenge" are available at our stores!
- Artists Pigionbaby#723, Glamorgirly#335, RatoBaleado#475, ToxicSoul#102 and Clarice#3187 rocked with their creations!
- Get your favorite looks now at the avatar store!
- Bug fixes and small enhancements.

CRAZY RUN 2.0
- Our robots have worked hard and now the levels in Crazy Run are different every day! What are you waiting for? Call your friends to play with you!
- Oh… Now you also get tickets every time you complete a run!

CRAZY RUN 2.0
- Our robots have worked hard and now the levels in Crazy Run are different every day! What are you waiting for? Call your friends to play with you!
- Oh… Now you also get tickets every time you complete a run!

SOCIAL APP
- You can post up to 5 photos per day in your very own profile page within the new Social App! Just click the "share on feed" button after taking a picture with your PK XD Smartphone!
- There is also a brand new photo filter feature so you can add extra amazingness to your pictures! Grayscale? Sepia? We got you covered!

SPREAD THE LIKES
- Through the Social App you can check out other players' photo timelines. You can filter by nearby players, your friends list and even search specific players!
- Make sure to leave a "like" on their photos! You'll make their day!

CHRISTMAS HAS ARRIVED!
- Ice skate around the island and purchase exclusive items at Santa's Shop!
- Five new chilling pets are available to purchase through multiple ways during the event
- New items are available at Santa's Shop to purchase using Ornaments!
- Check out the Christmas smartphone app and collect all prizes by completing quests

ORNAMENTS
- This is a special type of currency available only during the event and is used to purchase items at Santa's Shop

CHRISTMAS HAS ARRIVED!
- Ice skate around the island and purchase exclusive items at Santa's Shop!
- Five new chilling pets are available to purchase through multiple ways during the event
- New items are available at Santa's Shop to purchase using Ornaments!
- Check out the Christmas smartphone app and collect all prizes by completing quests

ORNAMENTS
- This is a special type of currency available only during the event and is used to purchase items at Santa's Shop

- Bug fixes and small enhancements.

BYE, BYE CHRISTMAS!
- The PK XD team would like to thank everyone who participated in the Christmas Event! We hope you really enjoyed it! We've got a special gift hidden somewhere for you!

WELCOME 2021!
- Thank you to everyone who was with us in 2020. We’re an amazing community thanks to you guys!
- 2021 will also be amazing. We have a lot of news coming to PK XD and can’t wait for all the tales we’ll be experiencing together!

Guys, we reached 500,000 citizens on Global Instagram!
- And we have two amazing gifts for you: an insane t-shirt and a backpack! Enjoy! And now, towards 1M citizens!

NEW HOME-BUYING APP!
- Buy and manage your homes more easily!
- With this new app, you can find out the number of rooms and floors, as well as the furniture limit. Plus, you can now take a tour of the house before you even buy it!

Our social media app finally has a name: youni! And it's more complete than ever!
- Explore your friend's and nearby citizen's feeds and get to meet new people!
- Now you can tag other players in your photos and visit their profiles much easier!

- Buy and manage your homes more easily!
- With this new app, you can find out the number of rooms and floors, as well as the furniture limit. Plus, you can now take a tour of the house before you even buy it!

Our social media app finally has a name: youni! And it's more complete than ever!
- Explore your friend's and nearby citizen's feeds and get to meet new people!
- Now you can tag other players in your photos and visit their profiles much easier!

- THE STICKER BOOK is our newest feature! By performing certain actions and playing in certain ways you can earn different stickers to showcase your PK XD mastery!
- Special "challenge" stickers unlock new items for purchase in the shops, while secret stickers will have you gather your friends to figure out how to fulfill their requirements! Have fun!

- Bug fixes.
Account registration bug fixed!

HAPPY EASTER!
- Easter has finally come to PK XD! Bring your friends and explore HUGE changes around the islands!

EASTER EGGS
- A new special currency is available only during this event and you can use it to purchase items at the Easter Store

EGG HUNT MINIGAME
- Bring your friends and play PK XD's first cooperative minigame, the Egg Hunt! You can play by joining the AI whenever it sends a notification to all players.

NEW EVENT NEW REWARDS
- Play Egg Hunt, Pet Parade and Crazy Run to earn points and get exclusive rewards. But beware, this only lasts during the event!

EASTER HAS ENDED
- We would like to thank all the people that took part in our Easter Event! It was another amazing event, and we hope you have enjoyed it!

- Bug fixes and small enhancements.
- Let us know what you think! Write your review to help us keep improving!

THE PET FESTIVAL HAS ARRIVED AT PK XD!
- The pets are on the loose! Call your friends and enjoy the adventures of this awesome celebration!
- Practice parkour through giant balloons, customize your pet with themed items, secure the chance to win new stickers, interact with several statues and pets, and follow the paw prints scattered around the island!

PET PODS
- Open Pet Pods faster by watching the ADs!
- Watch one AD a day to win a Mega Pet Pod for free!

SPECIAL PACKS
- Match your avatar and pet with these themed items!

MAKEOVER CONTEST
- There is more! The winners itens of the Makeover Challenge Contest are available at PK XD. Which one will you choose?
- Congratulations to the contest winners: MaryPop #345, Gominyu #942, ShadowKittyUWU #647, Linda #78045 e anneclarinha #243.
